comments: Column sequence for m=1 (without leading zeros) of the Sheffer triangle (exp(5*x),exp(x)-1) of 5-restricted Stirling2 numbers. See A193685. [From Wolfdieter Lang, Oct 07 2011]
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (18,-107,210).
formula: If we define f(m,j,x)=sum(binomial(m,k)*stirling2(k,j)*x^(m-k),k=j..m) then a(n-2)=f(n,2,5), (n>=2). [From _Milan Janjic_, Apr 26 2009]E.g.f.: diff(exp(5*x)*(exp(x)-1)^2/2!,x$2). See the Sheffer triangle comment above. [From Wolfdieter Lang, Oct 07 2011]Contribution from Vincenzo Librandi, Oct 08 2011: (Start)a(n) = (7^(n+2)+5^(n+2)-2*6^(n+2))/2a(n) = 18*a(n-1) - 107*a(n-2) + 210*a(n-3), n>=3.a(n) = 13*a(n-1) - 42*a(n-2) + 5^n, a(0)=1, a(1)=18. (End)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
